full_threads.body:
Hi Shelly,

Confirming we have updated the website.

Thanks

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/

Hi Shelly,

Sure, we will work on this in staging first to make sure everything is working correctly after the update, We will update you tomorrow.

Thanks Joel.

There seem to be a lot of plugins (13 I think) in the back end that need to be updated.

Can you also please check that out?

Shelly

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/

Hi Shelly,

Thanks Shelly, we have made updates to the site and it should be working correctly moving forward.

Oh yes.

The code is COMPLETEBEFORETRAINING

Thanks

Shelly

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/

Hi Shelly,

We are looking into this, sorry to hear about that. Can you send us the coupon code name?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

This is the second time I have had a client have a problem with the coupon for the online media training course. https://shellshockedmedia.com/media-presentation-training-with-shelly-horton/

Can you please urgently reset for Jeanne? She needs to do the course today.

Then perhaps we need a catch up to see why this is happening? I'm not sure what could have changed as it's been working for years.

Thanks

Shelly x





Shelly Horton
0404 868 463
https://shellshockedmedia.com






On Mon, 2 Dec 2024 at 14:08, Jeanne McArthur <Jeanne@mcarthurcommercial.com.au> wrote:
Hi there,

I'm so embarrassed!!

I did everything right I promise! Attached screenshot

Jeanne

X



Sent from my Galaxy



-------- Original message --------
From: Shelly Horton <shelly@shellshockedmedia.com>
Date: 2/12/24 2:32 pm (GMT+10:00)
To: Jeanne McArthur <Jeanne@mcarthurcommercial.com.au>
Subject: Re: Speak with Impact

Bahahaaa

I think there is a bit of a glitch I'm getting our IT guys to look at.

Try putting the code in at the end where you checkout not before.

Proceed to check out then put code in on the right. Then click Apply Coupon.

You have to add all of your details still.

If that doesn't work I'll copy in my IT guys.

Call me if it doesn't work





Shelly Horton
0404 868 463
https://shellshockedmedia.com






On Mon, 2 Dec 2024 at 1:27 pm, Jeanne McArthur <Jeanne@mcarthurcommercial.com.au> wrote:
Hi Lovely,

I think I have broken the cart… lol

I really wanted to do the 1 hour course before we speak. It keeps telling me there is something wrong at checkout.

I promise I put in the code and everything but as soon as I press order it says there is an error.

Is it a Jeanne thing or a genuine error thing? (the latter being something I have contributed to!)

I've come home to do the course so I am all in Shellshocked mode!!

Kind Regards,

Jeanne McArthur

Managing Director

Soooooo excited for a hug too.

430pm is great. I'll send you a Zoom link xxx



Shelly Horton
0404 868 463

On Sun, 1 Dec 2024 at 7:16 pm, Jeanne McArthur <Jeanne@mcarthurcommercial.com.au> wrote:
Hey you!

I am doing mine in the morning. I got completely derailed this month reporting as I go into my leaner months with the court closures coming up.

I am beyond excited to see you too and need a big hug to be honest.. x

Hope your writing is going well lovely

By the way I have passed your name to my client Brand Collective. I brought up your training to them last week.

Can we possibly do a 4.30- 5pm chat tomorrow?

Xx

Kind Regards,

Jeanne McArthur

Managing Director

From: Shelly Horton <shelly@shellshockedmedia.com>
Sent: Sunday, 1 December 2024 1:38 PM
To: Jeanne McArthur <Jeanne@mcarthurcommercial.com.au>
Subject: Speak with Impact


Hello lovely!

So excited to see you on Friday. Kasey has already done the online course - have you done yours yet?

Just checking to see if you have time for a 15min chat between 1230pm and 530pm on Monday? I want to make sure I tailor the workshop so you get what you need. I'll be chatting with Kasey separately.

Shelly x

Reminder...

So here are a few things for you…

1. The workshop will be 1-5pm at my home 8/22 Magnoli Circuit, Palm Beach. We have an amazing studio that we will be filming in.

2. Complete this one-hour course before the training. It will give you all the tips and tricks on presenting well. Then on the day we will dive straight into practical and film you and watch back on the spot for advice on how to improve. And yes it tells me when you do the course so don't leave it to the last minute!

https://shellshockedmedia.com/services/media-presentation-training-with-shelly-horton/

Click through and then in the "Apply Coupon" type in COMPLETEBEFORETRAINING for a 100% discount. It's normally $397 and you get to keep it for life.

3. Closer to the time I will be calling you to find out a bit more about what you want to achieve during the session so it's tailored for you.

4. Come "camera ready". What to wear is covered in the online course and just do your hair and make-up to the best of your ability. Bring powder and lipstick for touch ups. You can also bring a change of clothes if you'd like to record in different outfits.

5. Don't be nervous. I HAVE GOT YOU! It's hard learning a new skill but it's also rewarding and fun.

6. We will celebrate with champagne at 5pm!


Shelly Horton
0404 868 463
https://shellshockedmedia.com
